function.name: Vector3Sub

input.name: topic_name
input.desc: Name of the topic to which the function subscribes

input.name: size_queue
input.desc: Size of the queue

input.name: sleep
input.desc: sleep duration [-1 : block until receive data ; 0 non-blocking call; N > 0 : sleep during N milliseconds]

function.desc: Read geometry/Vector3 message and load value into a Row/Col 3D Vector.

input.desc: Name of the topic to which the function subscribes

input.desc: Size of the queue

input.name: sleep

function.desc: Read geometry/Vector3.x message load value into a Scalar.

function.name: AccelSub

input.name: topic_name
input.desc: Name of the topic to which the function subscribes

input.name: size_queue
input.desc: Size of the queue

input.name: sleep
input.desc: sleep duration [-1 : block until receive data ; 0 non-blocking call; N > 0 : sleep during N milliseconds]

function.desc: Read geometry/Accel message and load value into a Matrix. Matrix dimension must be [3,2] or [2,3] or [1,6] or [6,1]. For [2,3] Matrix, Linear part is loaded in the first row and Angular part in the second row. For [3,2] Matrix, Linear part is loaded in the first col and Angular in the second col. For other shape, Linear part is loaded first then Angular part.

input.name: topic_name
input.desc: Name of the topic to which the function subscribes

input.name: size_queue
input.desc: Size of the queue

input.name: sleep
input.desc: sleep duration [-1 : block until receive data ; 0 non-blocking call; N > 0 : sleep during N milliseconds]

function.desc: Read geometry/Accel.linear message and load value into a 3D Row or Col Vector.

function.desc: Read geometry/Twist message and load value into a Matrix. Matrix dimension must be [3,2] or [2,3] or [1,6] or [6,1]. For [2,3] Matrix, Linear part is loaded in the first row and Angular part in the second row. For [3,2] Matrix, Linear part is loaded in the first col and Angular in the second col. For other shape, Linear part is loaded first then Angular part.
